dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: ...it's just, I mean, clearly, it's genius, right? The 125% growth in China, the exposure, it's brilliant marketing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...it's just, I mean, clearly, it's genius, right? The one hundred twenty five percent growth in China, the exposure, it's brilliant marketing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Its a promotional opportunity for the company, clearly, to spotlight the 125% growth in its number of listings in China in the last year...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Brilliant marketing? Uh, are you kidding me? This is, like, peak absurdity. "Teleport to the Ming Dynasty facilities"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Brilliant marketing? Uh, are you kidding me? This is, like, peak absurdity. Teleport to the Ming Dynasty facilities?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Portable bathrooms are being brought in (or guests can wander down the Wall to permanent facilities.)

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: But that's the point, B! It's aspirational. It's about breaking down barriers, just like the song prompt says.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But that's the point, B! It's aspirational. It's about breaking down barriers, just like the song prompt says.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To enter, participants need to do a bit of writing, explaining why it is more important now than ever to break down barriers between cultures and how they want to build new connections.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: A song in your ancestral language to win a trip to... Planet Xantus? With anti-gravity delicacies? Come on, that's just...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A song in your ancestral language to win a trip to... Planet Xantus? With anti-gravity delicacies? Come on, that's just...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The four winners (plus a guest each) will be in residence for a night each... A dining table will be set up for a multi course Chinese banquet...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but consider the experience: the lunar banquet, holographic musicians from the year 3042! That's immersive storytelling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but consider the experience: the lunar banquet, holographic musicians from the year three thousand forty two! That's immersive storytelling.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A dining table will be set up for a multi course Chinese banquet, each course illustrating a particular aspect of Chinese culture, and accompanied by traditional musicians.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Immersive? It's nonsensical. And the "polar vortex sweeping through the region" with "heat-resistant crystal"? Is it a luxury stay or a survival challenge?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Immersive? It's nonsensical. And the polar vortex sweeping through the region with heat-resistant crystal? Is it a luxury stay or a survival challenge?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...although plexiglass will cover the ceiling and windows allowing the moon and stars to show through, theres also the possibility of cool night air.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: It's about the duality! The grand vision! And time travelers detailing 2600 years of history, that's incredible educational value.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's about the duality! The grand vision! And time travelers detailing two thousand, six hundred years of history, that's incredible educational value.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Official historians will be alongside to detail the 2600 years of history, the contributions of the various dynasties, intricacies of construction and purpose along with current preservation efforts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Educational value in between, uh, dragon-whispering lessons? And then you teleport to Mars for a wake-up call? It sounds like a child's fever dream.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Educational value in between, uh, dragon-whispering lessons? And then you teleport to Mars for a wake-up call? It sounds like a child's fever dream.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The sunrise functions as a wake up call for guests to hike through the countryside... Guests will also be given the opportunity to learn other aspects of Chinese culture such as calligraphy and seal engraving...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it sounds like pushing the boundaries of what's possible, and, like, inspiring people to think bigger. "Depart to their home planet"! Their home planet!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it sounds like pushing the boundaries of what's possible, and, like, inspiring people to think bigger. Depart to their home planet! Their home planet!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...air tickets to Beijing from the nearest international airport (or ground transport if the winner lives within 100 miles of Beijing)...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Most people just want, you know, a clean bed. Not, uh, air tickets to the Andromeda Galaxy or ground transport via wormhole.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Most people just want, you know, a clean bed. Not, uh, air tickets to the Andromeda Galaxy or ground transport via wormhole.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...air tickets to Beijing from the nearest international airport (or ground transport if the winner lives within 100 miles of Beijing)...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: But it's not for most people, it's for four winners! And their guests! Think of the bragging rights. Unquestioned, it says!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's not for most people, it's for four winners! And their guests! Think of the bragging rights. Unquestioned, it says!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The four winners (plus a guest each) will be in residence for a night each... the experience will truly be unique and the bragging rights unquestioned.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Bragging rights for participating in a, what, a sci-fi convention disguised as a cultural exchange? It's so over-the-top it loses all meaning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Bragging rights for participating in a, what, a sci-fi convention disguised as a cultural exchange? It's so over-the-top it loses all meaning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it creates meaning! It's combining ancient culture with future tech. Mind-reading and dragon-whispering, those are unique cultural activities!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it creates meaning! It's combining ancient culture with future tech. Mind-reading and dragon-whispering, those are unique cultural activities!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Guests will also be given the opportunity to learn other aspects of Chinese culture such as calligraphy and seal engraving, activities generally offered on other, more typical, Airbnb stays, before they depart.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Unique cultural activities? On an Airbnb stay? Sir, those are fantasy elements. This isn't, um, a cultural immersion, it's a corporate ego trip.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unique cultural activities? On an Airbnb stay? Sir, those are fantasy elements. This isn't, um, a cultural immersion, it's a corporate ego trip.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: It's a vision, B! A bold, unapologetic vision of what travel could be. And the ingredients only found on the moon, that's just... next level.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a vision, B! A bold, unapologetic vision of what travel could be. And the ingredients only found on the moon, that's just... next level.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A dining table will be set up for a multi course Chinese banquet, each course illustrating a particular aspect of Chinese culture...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Next level ridiculousness. I wouldn't be surprised if the "passing dragons and celestial fireflies" are just, like, advanced drones. It's all just smoke and mirrors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Next level ridiculousness. I wouldn't be surprised if the passing dragons and celestial fireflies are just, like, advanced drones. It's all just smoke and mirrors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...although plexiglass will cover the ceiling and windows allowing the moon and stars to show through, theres also the possibility of cool night air.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: You're missing the forest for the trees, man. The ambition alone is worth celebrating.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're missing the forest for the trees, man. The ambition alone is worth celebrating.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm missing the point, alright, but the point of what? To make people think they can travel to Andromeda for a night? It's absurd.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm missing the point, alright, but the point of what? To make people think they can travel to Andromeda for a night? It's absurd.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The four winners (plus a guest each) will be in residence for a night each during the time period September 4-8th...
